ghidra.description: GhidraMCP - Query Ghidra directly from Claude for reverse engineering

instructions: 2. Headless install: unzip to ~/ghidra/Ghidra/Extensions/, then unzip inner GhidraMCP-1-4.zip
3. Enable once in GUI: File → Configure → Developer → GhidraMCPPlugin
5. Install deps: pip install mcp requests
6. Update path above to your bridge_mcp_ghidra.py location
Requires: Ghidra running with binary loaded and plugin enabled on port 8080

exa-mcp-server.description: Exa AI web search and code context search

instructions: This is a Claude Code plugin, not a standard MCP server
Install via: claude mcp add plugin:exa-mcp-server:exa
Useful for: searching GitHub issues, ARM64 ABI docs, Ghidra API
